name: Fate Stay Night - Unlimited Blade Works

quotes.show: Fate Stay Night - Unlimited Blade Works
quotes.quote: "Hero of Justice? A world where no one is hurt?" Don't be absurd. "Humanity" is the name for an animal that cannot find joy in life without sacrifice. The pretty lie that is "equality" is nonsense spouted by weaklings who cannot look upon the darkness. Nothing but an excuse to cover up life's ugliness.

quotes.show: Fate Stay Night - Unlimited Blade Works
quotes.quote: The things we can't obtain are the most beautiful ones.
